entities.name: ron
entities.description: The main character in the story who is trying to force Scabbers into his pocket.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Ron's pet rat that is wriggling madly and biting Ron.

relationships.description: Ron owns Scabbers, as indicated by the fact that he is trying to force Scabbers into his pocket.
Scabbers bites Ron, causing him pain and prompting an exclamation of 'OUCH!'
